faq.question: What is DazLng?
faq.answer: DazLng is a Lightning Network node management platform that helps you monitor and optimize your node's performance.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: To get started, simply create an account and connect your Lightning Network node. Our platform will guide you through the setup process.

faq.question: What features are available?
faq.answer: DazLng offers various features including node monitoring, channel management, network analysis, and AI-powered recommendations through DazIA.

faq.question: How does DazIA work?
faq.answer: DazIA is our AI assistant that analyzes your node's data and provides personalized recommendations to optimize your Lightning Network operations.

sections.title: Our Mission
sections.content: DazLng was born from the desire to simplify Lightning Network node management. Our mission is to make the Lightning network more accessible and efficient for everyone.

sections.title: Our Technology
sections.content: We use advanced algorithms and artificial intelligence to optimize your Lightning channels management and maximize your revenue.

sections.title: Our Vision
sections.content: We aspire to become the reference platform for Lightning Network node management, offering innovative tools and an exceptional user experience.

sections.title: Our Team
sections.content: Our team consists of experts passionate about Bitcoin and the Lightning network, determined to build the future of decentralized payments.

delivery.question: How does Daznode delivery work?
delivery.answer: Your Daznode is delivered within 10 business days after payment confirmation. We'll send you a tracking email with the tracking number. The package is insured and requires a signature upon delivery.

package.question: What's included in the Daznode package?
package.answer: Your Daznode package includes: a Raspberry Pi 5 (8GB RAM), 1TB SSD, custom cooling solution, secure case, quick installation guide, and all necessary cables. The node comes pre-configured with LND software and 50,000 sats pre-loaded.

installation.question: How do I install my Daznode?
installation.answer: Installation is simple thanks to our plug-and-play configuration: 1) Connect your Daznode to the Internet via Ethernet, 2) Plug in the power supply, 3) Access the web interface via the provided address, 4) Follow the initial setup wizard. Our team is available for video call guidance if needed.

included.question: What support is included with my Daznode?
included.answer: You get 2 weeks of dedicated support after receiving your node. This includes: installation assistance, channel configuration, parameter optimization, and technical troubleshooting. Support is available via email, chat, or video call.

channels.question: How do I manage my Lightning channels?
channels.answer: Our intuitive interface makes channel management easy. We guide you through creating your first channels and advise on the best network connection strategies. The included DazIA Premium subscription provides optimization recommendations.

security.question: How do I secure my node?
security.answer: Your Daznode comes with hardened Linux configuration and encrypted storage. We help you set up backups and secure your keys. A comprehensive security guide is provided.

premium.question: What's included in the DazIA Premium subscription?
premium.answer: The one-year DazIA Premium subscription includes: personalized network analysis, channel optimization recommendations, real-time alerts, weekly performance reports, and priority technical support access.

renewal.question: How do I renew my subscription?
renewal.answer: One month before your Premium subscription expires, you'll receive an email with renewal options. Renewal can be done directly from your dashboard with Lightning payment.

upgrade.question: Can I upgrade my node?
upgrade.answer: Yes, we offer hardware and software upgrade options. Our team advises on the best options for your needs and can perform upgrades remotely or guide you through the process.
